#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{	
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	long long ans,t,a,b,i,j,x;
	int flag;
	std::vector<long long> v;
	std::vector<long long>::iterator low,low2;
	for(i=1;i<1000002;i++)
	{
		x=sqrt(i);
		flag=1;
		for(j=2;j<=x;j++)
		{
			if(i%j==0)
			{
				flag=0;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag==1)
		{
			v.push_back(i);
		}
	}
	//cout<<v.size();
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
		ans=0;
		
		low=lower_bound(v.begin(),v.end(),a+1);
		//low2=lower_bound(v.begin(),v.end(),b+1);
		for(j=(low-v.begin())-1;v[j]<=b;j++)
		{
			if(v[j]>=a)
				ans++;
		}
		//ans=(low2-v.begin())-(low-v.begin());		
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
